```{r, include=FALSE}

```

```{r}
Republicans <- contributions %>%
  left_join(candidates, by= "cand_id")%>%
  filter(cand_party_affiliation=="REP", transaction_amt>0)%>%
  group_by(state)%>%
  summarise(total_contributions= sum(transaction_amt),
            average_contributions= mean(transaction_amt))
```
